text: The following is a list of the mayors of Phoenix, Arizona. First Mayor of Phoenix, John T. Alsap Third and sixth Mayor of Phoenix, DeForest Porter Twenty-eighth Mayor of Phoenix, George U. Nelson (fill-in) || 1994 |- | 56 || Thelda Williams (interim) ||March, 1994 – November 4, 1994 |- | 57 || Skip Rimsza || November 4, 1994 – January 2, 2004 |- | 58 || Phil Gordon || January 2, 2004 – December 31, 2011 |- | 59 || Thelda Williams (interim) || December 31, 2011 - January 3, 2012 |- | 60 || Greg Stanton || January 3, 2012 – May 29, 2018 |- | 61 || Thelda Williams (interim) || May 29, 2018 – March 21, 2019 |- | 62 || Kate Gallego || March 21, 2019 – present |} ==Living former mayors of Phoenix== There are six living former mayors of Phoenix, the oldest being John B. Nelson (served 1994, born 1936). The most recent death of a former mayor of Phoenix was that of Timothy A.
